attributes.action: Increase statutory sick pay to at least 75% of basic salary per day
attributes.additional_details: more chances that people will stay indoors without worry that wont have enough to pay bills and buy food
attributes.background: increase statutory sick pay for working people, currently very low £91 a week is not enough for person with mortgage and other bills to self isolate for 2 weeks. specially if people on benefits able to claim £500

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase Statutory Sick Pay (SSP): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559857

Fund full sick pay for employees that are off work due to COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551962
